context: The Hunger Games is one of my favorite books. Could you recommend a similar book?
rec: Gregor and the Marks of Secret
resp: The Hunger Games is written by Suzanne Collins, who also wrote Gregor and the Marks of Secret. Perhaps that would be a good book.
